locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Decent location. All the fuel pumps work, shower was nice and hot. Good water flow. Not that many trash cans unfortunately over a good location.
David McleanLocal Guide · 836 reviews · 963 photos
Im new to the trucking industry but not new to pilot. There's alot of parking spaces available for truck drivers at this location and the shower are always clean and the lines are usually short.

These truck stops are a modern day joke. Is it to hard to put ventilation in the showers or does that cut into your bottom line? No,  a rotating fan isn't ventilation. No cold water in shower. Either hot or very warm. Therefore you're …

If I could give this place negative stars, I would. I left my wallet in the driver shower and 5 minutes later went back to get it and was told it wasn’t left there and I KNOW IT WAS. It was taken by either the cleaning man, Mr. Danny, or …
It was kinda busy at 11:30pm but fueled quickly and could still find a parking spot. Shower was available right away and it was clean. The two cashiers were really friendly.

I became homeless about 3 weeks ago and been living in my car I had some money but was holding to it tightly hadn't  showered in 8 days a(I usually shower at least 2 to 3 times a day) Soo tired of living in my sweat and stench so finally …

Non handicap employee in handicap stall & would not come out.  She finally told me to go to cashier & ask to be let in the shower stall to go to bathroom.  Obviously they need more than 1 handicap stall.
Shower was clean and so was the facility.  Would have been five stars, but there are 20-30 people in here and one cashier.
Great showers! Water quality is super! Good temp and pressure too! Thank you drivers for giving me a shower! God bless you! ~buslife
Lot of parking! Most easy to get into, Shower was clean, bathrooms needed some attention though. Overall not bad.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Moldy showers, no face cloths, water spraying out all parts of the shower head and covering,  as well as both soap holers broken off. …

… aisles, out of supplies by the coffee area. Ladies room has torn paper towels on the counter, unswept floor, overflowing trash cans in the stalls. Definitely NOT paying for a shower here. Worried about the germs in there Just sayin...

Lazy workers with attitudes. Check out lady was very rude and waited hour for shower because no was cleaning them even though there was a line. One guy was outside smoking for 20 minutes.. restrooms were disgusting and filthy

… go to Love's quite often. This loves had the filthiest bathroom I have ever seen! The shower had a bunch of mold in it and the outside of the toilet must not have been wiped for weeks! They had not even swept the floor for crying out loud!

Very poor customer service. When in to shower was advised the shower were down. Attempted to use the restroom but was unable to do so due to poor housekeeping by staff members. Went to the manager and she blamed the poor housekeeping of the …
Lock door or someone will walk in on you shower system seems to be out of wack here, shower aren’t cleaned her and clog up something terrible
Shower rooms Needs Better Attention We Still in the Woods For Covid Cases Floating Around!!

This review is newer than most others on here. The really bad reviews of dirty showers were from before they redid the showers. They are clean now, and modern. Nice hot water, everything is fine. Some diesel pumps don't work but mine worked …

Good morning everyone. My respect and appreciation to people who work there. They are honest and great.I am truck driver who lost a wallet before 2 days at the shower cabin. I understood that thing 5 hours later . I panicked cause I didn’t …

It’s alright , just your typical loves … they have Arby’s , it’s pretty clean , showers are decent . At least my shower , shower 7 didn’t really have good pressure but it was enough to get the job done . I have decent Verizon signal close …

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: One of the better locations with good shower, laundry and evening parking available
… Update: went in to shower later and was told the shower was ready for us and clean. Well there was poop all over the handicap seat and even some on the walls.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Shellie n Wes Storie_…_Update:_went_in_to_shower_later_and_was_told_the_Edited a year ago

showerReviews.reviewText: … it here. Clean and quiet. I haven't noticed any reserved parking here. That's a plus. The shower was clean. The laundry room was clean, and the machines looked new. I had dinner and breakfast here. Dinner was good. Breakfast, however, …

… paper towels from the ladies room. That was not the worst part of it all. He walked to the shower area and sat then whiped his knose on the sleeve of his white work jacket. Other than this one male. It's a great place. Friendly   kind …

The showers were very clean. The shower attendant  was very sweet and kind for it being 430 in the morning.on Friday the 16 of Feb.  The food at iron skillet  was ok. Would not mind have to park there again if we have a run though again.

You'd think that if you buy over 600.00 in diesel you could get 2 free drink refills and a shower for free. Not sure what the deal is with that, but had to buy drinks at the fuel desk, then have the clerk put a shower on the card to get the …

Very disappointed in the Petro this morning past 3 other trucks tops to stop here for a shower only to be told there none clean and no one will be here to clean them for another hour. Big talk on the xm about ta/petro making their stops …

Good place. The only reason they didn't get 5 stars is lack of water faucet. Shower tank fill up needs faucet, not the nozzle on the fuel island. Would stop again but make sure I don't need water first.

Ice cold shower.....they should pay to have anyone use it!    My co-driver had identical experience.....not a fluke.  Trying food next.  Let ya know......edit:. Food and servers good.. upgraded to two stars... FIX THE SHOWER
No more free shower credits for shop work. F this chain. They've lost a customer that brings tens of thousands of dollars a year in shop work.

showerReviews.reviewText: Unacceptable trip hazard in the shower #2. And it seems like its been there for a while.  Dangerous condition, lack of management and maintenance. …

Friendly & helpful staff, good variety of products but shower # 4 is going to get them a lawsuit soon. When the water tanks switch to provide you with consistent water temperature it will scald you followed immediately with ice cold water …

… from Lancaster County Pennsylvania and Stopped in real quick (She’ll Remember ….I’m the one who never saw a shower in a rest stop before How cool!?!?!?!?!) anyway, It’s such a rare treat these days to receive such exceptional customer …

The only regrets i have about this TA is that it will only allow a 5 star rating! This place and showers were extremely awesome. Stafe very pleasant and willing to go the extra mile for us. My wife is handicap and upon seeing that they nade …

… slow and unclean. The showers open for the truckers was disgusting, the floors unclean and dirty, the shower had mold and mildew everywhere in the shower and in the bathroom space within the personal showers. I personally am allergic …

I took a shower here today. The room had a really bad smell, the toilet seat was wobbly and dirty, there was no soap by the sink (only had a bar soap in a pkg which got used once and then trashed which was a waste of money), and the price …
I would give it a 5 star rating but I left my necklace in shower. They said somebody must have taken but the first person that would have seen it would have been the one that cleans the showers.

Wonderful friendly customer service and every one is nice and clean restrooms shower
Thank you all for you hard work , love it
I am blowen away I thought Love's has the best showers well you got a very very close tie I'm thinking TA got you beat clean very massage shower heads I'm thinking two thumbs up for TA
Clean. Ample truck parking. No wait for an open shower.

locations.content: Porky's Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … to be opened. The bathrooms are always clean and the showers are clean too I think its $8 for a shower the coffee is good they only have drinks and snacks the restaurant inside is it or miss I think its closed now. Fuel is available. And …
The best service and the best food, it has truck parking, and have shower

Pleasantly surprised at how clean the shower rooms were.  But very disappointed at the lack of hot water.  My shower was cold.  I got about 1 minute of barely lukewarm water.  The lady up front was very nice.  The store was clean as well

Showers are $12, not $8. They are very clean though and they do provide linens!! There isn’t a restaurant in here but there’s 3 different ones you can walk to. Cute little truck stop! Was trying to make it to pilot for a free shower but my …
Advertised as 24hrs and a truck stop. Truckers driving after a long day would love to take a shower and possibly eat. You should change your hours if you are not open 24hrs!

There are pot holes, but not many, and are easy to avoid. At 1AM, I went to take a shower. The door was locked, but for security reasons (that's the America we live in folks). She opened it, and I paid $8 for a hot shower. The shower has …

… pot holes. Store inside is cool. Cute little souvenirs. Customer service is always good going in there, and the shower is very clean though a bit run down. My only real complaint is the parking lot. You'd need maybe two small dump trucks …
Very nice clean quiet place to shower and sleep staff very nice and helpful thanks definitely will be stopping here again.

So many potholes in their truck parking area.
Fresh Eats in the freezer are good for $8
Shower was clean for $8

If I could give no stars I would,  we got a free shower,  cashier didn't tell us it didn't have hot water till afterwards when I confronted her, will never be back to south of the border, laughing cashier was not appropriate,  and we work …

showerReviews.reviewText: I didn't fuel or shower here, but I did use the bathroom and eat here. Everybody seems friendly, the food was good and good priced. A nice little dirt lot to park a truck in, but overall a good place for stopping to eat or take a half hour …

Stopped here for a few hours of sleep and a shower. Well worth it. Shower was a bit outdated but extremely clean. 5 clean towels and very hot water. Even came with a nice chair to sit and put your socks on. Staff was very friendly as well …

Shower was clean. Fuel was competitively priced.  If using a fuel card, they charge credit price.  If paying cash, it is 10 cents less per gallon.  Parking lot is a well maintained dirt lot with good parking.  People are friendly.  Restaura …
Shower is ok . Hamburgers and hotdogs ok . But no breakfast selection  . No country ham no gravy biscuits No tenderloin.  Friendly  but charge for everything.
